nodes.text: Tielon was a female Human who lived during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. She made her living as a merchant on board Carrick Station.

Tielon first appeared in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare in 2011, as a Tatooine planetary commendation vendor on board Carrick Station. She was later relabeled as the Level 25 Equipment Vendor, though she was later removed along with the rest of the planetary Equipment Vendors in Game Update 4.0 on October 20, 2015.
